2023 年 11 月 23 日星期四 05:59:30 +0000每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
为什么你不应该相信无聊|凯文·H·加里凯文·H·加里Are you actually bored, or is something else going on? Educator Kevin H. Gary shares three practical takeaways to deal with the doldrums, so you can take control of your attention, figure out which feelings to trust and name the real problem.为什么你不应该相信无聊|凯文·H·加里Are you actually bored, or is something else going on? Educator Kevin H. Gary shares three practical takeaways to deal with the doldrums, so you can take control of your attention, figure out which feelings to trust and name the real problem. https://www.ted.com/talks/kevin_h_gary_why_you_shouldn_t_trust_boredom?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:120759 120759 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 15:31:59 +0000高等教育不00:10:52泰德
当拜登会见习近平时（以及美国和中国发生了什么）|伊恩·布雷默伊恩·布雷默US President Joe Biden and President of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping recently met in San Francisco. It was the first time Xi had visited the US in six years — and the first time the two leaders had met in person in a year. Geopolitical expert Ian Bremmer explains the implications of the meeting, sharing context and insight on areas where the pair agree — and flagging key areas where tensions might yet arise. (This conversation with TED's Helen Walters was recorded on November 20, 2023.)当拜登会见习近平时（以及美国和中国发生了什么）|伊恩·布雷默US President Joe Biden and President of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping recently met in San Francisco. It was the first time Xi had visited the US in six years — and the first time the two leaders had met in person in a year. Geopolitical expert Ian Bremmer explains the implications of the meeting, sharing context and insight on areas where the pair agree — and flagging key areas where tensions might yet arise. (This conversation with TED's Helen Walters was recorded on November 20, 2023.) https://www.ted.com/talks/ian_bremmer_when_biden_met_xi_and_what_s_going_on_with_the_us_and_china?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:120983 120983 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 16:10:12 +0000高等教育不00:42:55泰德
政治变革速成课程|凯蒂·费伊凯蒂·费伊You don't need political power to make real change, says activist Katie Fahey. She tells the story of how she led a successful movement in Michigan to end gerrymandering — the practice of drawing district lines to favor one political party — and how it all started with a simple social media post.政治变革速成课程|凯蒂·费伊You don't need political power to make real change, says activist Katie Fahey. She tells the story of how she led a successful movement in Michigan to end gerrymandering — the practice of drawing district lines to favor one political party — and how it all started with a simple social media post. https://www.ted.com/talks/katie_fahey_a_crash_course_in_making_political_change?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:120758 120758 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 16:05:06 +0000高等教育不00:15:10泰德
迈向 AGI 的激动人心而又危险的旅程 |伊利亚·苏茨克韦尔伊利亚·苏茨克韦尔Just weeks before the management shakeup at OpenAI rocked Silicon Valley and made international news, the company's cofounder and chief scientist Ilya Sutskever explored the transformative potential of artificial general intelligence (AGI), highlighting how it could surpass human intelligence and profoundly transform every aspect of life. Hear his take on the promises and perils of AGI — and his optimistic case for how unprecedented collaboration will ensure its safe and beneficial development.迈向 AGI 的激动人心而又危险的旅程 |伊利亚·苏茨克韦尔Just weeks before the management shakeup at OpenAI rocked Silicon Valley and made international news, the company's cofounder and chief scientist Ilya Sutskever explored the transformative potential of artificial general intelligence (AGI), highlighting how it could surpass human intelligence and profoundly transform every aspect of life. 认识一下甲烷，这个看不见的气候恶棍|马塞洛·梅纳马塞洛·梅纳A landfill on fire doesn't only emit a horrid stench — it has devastating consequences for the environment, too. The culprit is methane, an often underestimated greenhouse gas produced in large part by food systems, organic waste and yes, cow burps. Biochemical engineer Marcelo Mena explains the source of this sneaky pollutant, why its emissions need to be cut in half by 2050 — and what you can do to help.认识一下甲烷，这个看不见的气候恶棍|马塞洛·梅纳A landfill on fire doesn't only emit a horrid stench — it has devastating consequences for the environment, too. The culprit is methane, an often underestimated greenhouse gas produced in large part by food systems, organic waste and yes, cow burps. Biochemical engineer Marcelo Mena explains the source of this sneaky pollutant, why its emissions need to be cut in half by 2050 — and what you can do to help. https://www.ted.com/talks/marcelo_mena_meet_macet_the_invisible_climate_villain?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:119434 119434 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 15:54:44 +0000高等教育不00:09:13泰德
驾驶电动车的秘密好处|辛西娅·威廉姆斯辛西娅·威廉姆斯Electric vehicles need to be more than just eco-friendly — they have to be more chic, convenient and affordable than their gas-powered alternatives, says sustainability leader Cynthia Williams. She explores what it'll take for an electric revolution to succeed in the US, calling on corporations, policy leaders, investors and more to collaborate in unprecedented ways.驾驶电动车的秘密好处|辛西娅·威廉姆斯Electric vehicles need to be more than just eco-friendly — they have to be more chic, convenient and affordable than their gas-powered alternatives, says sustainability leader Cynthia Williams. 你真的像你想象的那样擅长某件事吗？ |罗宾·克莱默罗宾·克莱默Does confidence equal competence? Not quite. In a talk that will make you better aware of yourself, experimental psychologist Robin Kramer delves into the Dunning-Kruger effect — which argues that those who are least capable often overestimate their skills the most — and explores just how good you are at judging your own abilities.你真的像你想象的那样擅长某件事吗？ |罗宾·克莱默Does confidence equal competence? Not quite. In a talk that will make you better aware of yourself, experimental psychologist Robin Kramer delves into the Dunning-Kruger effect — which argues that those who are least capable often overestimate their skills the most — and explores just how good you are at judging your own abilities. https://www.ted.com/talks/robin_kramer_are_you_really_as_good_at_something_as_you_think?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:120286 120286 Thu, 16 Nov 2023 15:48:36 +0000高等教育不00:10:46泰德
我们经济的真正黄金在我们手中|萨尔瓦多·卡利萨尔瓦多·卡利The vast majority of our time at work is spent trudging through redundant and outdated workflows, says operations visionary Salvatore Cali. Laying out the most common time-wasting pitfalls, he urges policy leaders and businesses to reevaluate what they ask of both employees and consumers. "By rethinking the true purpose of each task, you will discover what is waste and what is the real gold of your company: the creation of value," says Cali.我们经济的真正黄金在我们手中|萨尔瓦多·卡利The vast majority of our time at work is spent trudging through redundant and outdated workflows, says operations visionary Salvatore Cali. Laying out the most common time-wasting pitfalls, he urges policy leaders and businesses to reevaluate what they ask of both employees and consumers. "By rethinking the true purpose of each task, you will discover what is waste and what is the real gold of your company: the creation of value," says Cali. https://www.ted.com/talks/salvatore_cali_the_real_gold_of_our_economy_is_in_our_hands?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:119599 119599 Wed, 15 Nov 2023 15:58:09 +0000高等教育不00:11:34泰德
为什么你应该抛弃致命的化石燃料设备？唐纳尔·贝尔德唐纳尔·贝尔德In the US, people spend the overwhelming majority of their time inside buildings that burn fossil fuels, which are bad for both the environment and human health. (Think: breathing in air pollution from gas stoves, furnaces and water heaters.) If we're going to fix this problem, we need to retrofit millions of buildings with all-electric equipment, says energy upgrader Donnel Baird. Hear about his ambitious plan to rip the fossil fuel infrastructure out of aging buildings and upgrade it with smarter, cleaner, healthier technology.为什么你应该抛弃致命的化石燃料设备？唐纳尔·贝尔德In the US, people spend the overwhelming majority of their time inside buildings that burn fossil fuels, which are bad for both the environment and human health. If we're going to fix this problem, we need to retrofit millions of buildings with all-electric equipment, says energy upgrader Donnel Baird. Hear about his ambitious plan to rip the fossil fuel infrastructure out of aging buildings and upgrade it with smarter, cleaner, healthier technology. https://www.ted.com/talks/donnel_baird_why_you_should_ditch_deadly_fossil_fuel_appliances?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:120096 120096 Tue, 14 Nov 2023 15:51:38 +0000高等教育不00:10:15泰德
“中年危机”的替代方案|奇普·康利奇普·康利Midlife doesn't have to be a scary time, says entrepreneur Chip Conley. In this short yet profound talk, he takes inspiration from the natural world to reframe our 40s, 50s and 60s as a transitional stage that's full of grace and beauty — and urges us all to make aging aspirational. “中年危机”的替代方案|奇普·康利Midlife doesn't have to be a scary time, says entrepreneur Chip Conley. In this short yet profound talk, he takes inspiration from the natural world to reframe our 40s, 50s and 60s as a transitional stage that's full of grace and beauty — and urges us all to make aging aspirational. https://www.ted.com/talks/chip_conley_an_alternative_to_the_midlife_crisis?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118670 118670 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 15:51:03 +0000高等教育不00:03:28泰德
灵性与气候变化的意想不到的联系|戈帕尔·D·帕特尔戈帕尔·D·帕特尔Environmental activist Gopal D. Patel thinks the climate movement could learn a lot from one of the longest-standing social initiatives in human history: religion. Exploring three areas where frameworks from faith traditions could benefit the climate movement, Patel offers a playbook for discovering your big idea to build momentum towards powerful social change.灵性与气候变化的意想不到的联系|戈帕尔·D·帕特尔Environmental activist Gopal D.
